column4: hello all. i'm new to ubuntu. :) i've just installed the system and i don't have any sound. I have ICH6 so i found this http://www.ubuntulinux.org/wiki/HdaIntelSoundHowto but something is wrong. The first way is ok until i try type sudo alsaconf -> i get "unknown command". So i tried the alternative way. But I got "cannot find packet"
ok... so why is this in ubuntu wiki? how to handle with intel high definition audio?
I don't know why it's on the wiki
probably written by a debian user?
